newsitem.title: UK: London equity dealers assoc drums up charity funds.
newsitem.headline: London equity dealers assoc drums up charity funds.

text.p: The International Equity Dealers Association on Thursday put out a call for members to buy raffle tickets for a draw at its annual dinner at the Whitbread Brewery in central London on May 15.

Members were invited to call Philip Dumas, the Association's honorary secretary, on 0171 417 1035 to buy tickets which could win a top prize of two tickets to the Sydney Opera House, including flights. Proceeds go to charity.
